about.description: Our premium studio combines world-class design expertise with precision artistry. Led by professional makeup artists, we provide custom designs that highlight each clientâ€™s unique features. Experience unmatched quality and meticulous craftsmanship.

design.description: Our lead artist personally oversees every step, from consultation to final application, ensuring perfection. We analyze facial structure and aesthetics to create the most flattering design tailored to you. With attention to detail and expert techniques, we deliver refined and harmonious results.

reservation.description: Located in a luxurious penthouse in Gangnam, our private studio offers an exclusive and relaxing experience. Enjoy a serene setting while receiving top-tier service. We operate by appointment only, guaranteeing personalized care. Convenient transportation is available, including a direct airport bus stop at our doorstep.

academy.description1: Yoonble Academy offers an elite, small-group, personalized training program tailored to each individual's skill level. We provide an intensive, hands-on 1:1 training experience for those who are truly dedicated to mastering the craft, ensuring immediate practical application in real-world scenarios.
academy.description2: Our structured programs include a startup course that provides comprehensive guidance from beginning to end, and a specialized eyebrow course focusing on advanced techniques. Whether you're just starting in semi-permanent makeup or an experienced artist looking to refine your skills, our systematic approach ensures professional growth without unnecessary trial and error.

natural_brow.name: Natural Brow
natural_brow.description: Using micro-fine needles, this technique meticulously draws each strand to create a natural and fuller eyebrow appearance.

shadow_brow.name: Shadow Brow

1.question: How long does the treatment last?
1.answer: The longevity of semi-permanent procedures varies depending on skin type, lifestyle, and skin regeneration cycle. Typically, results last around 8 months to 1.5 years. As the color naturally fades, you can get a touch-up as needed.

2.question: Will it look natural immediately after the procedure?
2.answer: Immediately after the procedure, the color may appear darker, and there may be swelling or a peeling process. It generally looks natural within 7 to 10 days.

3.question: Is the procedure painful?
3.answer: Pain tolerance varies among individuals, but most people feel little to no pain. Some may experience a slight tingling or itching sensation, but it is generally bearable.

4.question: Can I wear makeup before my appointment? When can I wear makeup after the procedure?
4.answer: You can wear makeup when visiting, as we assist with cleansing the treatment area. (However, for eyelash perm treatments, eye makeup must be removed beforehand.) After the procedure, makeup can be applied the same day, avoiding the treated area.

5.question: Is a touch-up necessary after the procedure?
5.answer: A touch-up is optional, depending on personal preference. Since peeling varies for each individual, if you want a darker shade or need corrections after the first procedure, a touch-up is recommended.

6.question: Are there any cases where the procedure is not possible?
6.answer: Pregnant or breastfeeding individuals may not retain the pigment properly due to hormonal changes, and their skin may be more sensitive. Additionally, those who have had plastic surgery within the past six months should consult a doctor before scheduling an appointment.

7.question: Can I change the design or color of an existing semi-permanent procedure?
7.answer: This depends on the current condition of the previous procedure. Most cases can be corrected with a neutralization cover-up, but in some cases, removal and reapplication may be recommended.
